timeline.message:
EQL: Change default indices options

Ignore by default unavailable indices (same as ES) and verify that
allowNoIndices is set to false since at least one index is required
for validating the query.

Fix #62986

timeline.bodyText: @imotov not sure why this fails now... Essentially by changing the index option ignoreUnavailable from false to true the 403/unauthorized became a 404...
timeline.author: costin

replies.bodyText: I think it is because we ignore unavailable indices and ended up with no indices at all, which leads to 404.
replies.author: imotov

replies.bodyText: And previously we did not ignore them but because we couldn't get access to them to verify their existence we got the 403...Make sense.
replies.author: costin

timeline.bodyText: @astefan the change inside EQL high-level rest client.
